text: Koraa, â€˜allahe yi iccha karae tara bahirae mora nijara upakara-apakarara oparato mora kono adhikara na'i. Gayeba ba adrsyara jnana yadi mora thakilahemtena tente ma'i bahuto kalyana labha karailohemtena arau kono dharanara akalyane'i moka sparsa karaiba noraarailehemtena. Ma'i kerala imandara sampradayara babe satarkakarai arau susambadadatara bahirae ana eko nahayaâ€™
